pages.text: $(li)The Armor Stand is a block that allows you to hold and display Armors and Tools.$(br)$(li)To use it, first you have to place the Armor Stand.

$(li)Then, right click on them while you are holding an Armor or Tool in your hand.$(br)$(li)If you want to recover the placed item, just right click on the Armor Stand again while you are not holding any item in your hand.
